slok:
तमुवाच हृषीकेशः प्रहसन्निव भारत |
सेनयोरुभयोर्मध्ये विषीदन्तमिदं वचः ||२-१०||
transliteration:
tamuvāca hṛṣīkeśaḥ prahasanniva bhārata .
senayorubhayormadhye viṣīdantamidaṃ vacaḥ ||2-10||

siva.author: Swami Sivananda
siva.et: 2.10 To him who was despondent in the midst of the two armies, Krishna, as if smiling, O Bharata, spoke these words.
siva.ec: 2.10 तम् to him? उवाच spoke? हृषीकेशः Hrishikesha? प्रहसन् smiling? इव as it were? भारत O Bharata? सेनयोः of the armies? उभयोः (of) both? मध्ये in the middle? विषीदन्तम् despondent? इदम् this? वचः word.No commentary.
